result.execSummary:
The defendant Rufino Gomez Lopez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Pay court costs.   **NOTE: THE DEFENDANT IS ORDERED TO PAY ALL COURT OBLIGATIONS TO THE CLERK OF COURTS OFFICE.   Payment is due within 30 days.  If the Defendant cannot make the payment, he/she must report to the Clerk of Courts Office to set up a payment plan.  Failure to comply will result in other collection methods including a civil Judgment and/or suspension of your drivers license for two (2) years.  This judgment may be collected by income assignment if you fail to pay fines and costs as ordered.
-----------------------------

No alcohol.  No illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia.   No contact with victim without victim's and probation agent's consent.
-----------------------------

Provide biological specimen to state crime lab for DNA analysis, and pay DNA analysis surcharge.  The defendant must pay Department of Corrections Supervision fees.   Counseling as recommended by Probation Agent.
-----------------------------

timeConds.notes: The defendant is to complete a total of forty (40) hours of community service work during his period of probation with NO BUYOUT option.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Rufino Gomez Lopez

defendant.name: Gomez Lopez, Rufino

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Rufino  Gomez Lopez in court with attorney Francis P Raff.  Valerian A Powell appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Minutes filed.

Defendant Rufino Gomez Lopez in court with attorney Francis P Raff.  Matthew R. Leusink appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Not guilty plea entered. Minutes filed.  Status conference scheduled for September 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Signed bond filed with the court.

Defendant will not possess any guns or other weapons.  Defendant will not in any way contact or attempt to contact any victim(s) listed and will avoid their residence/place of employment or any place they are located and will avoid causing any other person, other than defendant's attorney, from doing so on defendant's behalf.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as through the mail, by telephone, by way of electronic device, in person, or through a third party.  VICTIM(S)/RESIDENCE(S): NO CONTACT WITH R.S.   Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.
Defendant Rufino Gomez Lopez appeared, Andrew Robert Herrmann appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Minutes Filed.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 27, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Plaintiff's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.  Notice of Motion and Motion for Establishment of Discovery Deadlines.
